pages.text: Purple rails have a max speed of 1.1x, which is a bit faster than normal rails; however other custom rails may be faster. Note that minecarts can't turn at this speed, so slow them down at curves or they'll jump off the track!

Purple rails can be crafted using purple dye and a normal rail. Powered variants of these rails always have a 0.9x speed boost, and when given redstone power, give the full 1.1x speed boost that the purple rails support. If boosting is not sustained, the minecart will slow down quickly.
Purple rails can float in mid air, but cannot be walked upon
Powered purple rails super boost minecarts when powered up
Only powered up with direct redstone power, and hurts enemies that pass over it in minecarts
Turns off faster when carts are off the detector rail
